title: Interpretation of talking to the dead in a dream or talking to the deceased in a dream

preview.html: Seeing talking with the dead about single people, about married people, about pregnant women, about divorced people, about men, talking on the phone with the dead, seeing the dead talking with Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi. Fahd Al-Osaimi and others reported seeing the deceased and talking to him in a dream. Among the dreams that cause a state of anxiety and confusion in the dreamer when he sees them in a dream, they can also cause a state of panic and fear due to speaking out loud or anger at the dreamer or the dead, such as talking to the dead in a dream carries with it many clues and connotations that should The dreamer must know it correctly, as the commentator Ibn Kathir explains it in all his complete interpretations. Interpretation of a conversation with the dead in a dream. If the vision relates to a dead person you know, and she tells you in your dream that he is not dead, then this indicates the fairness of the dead person’s affairs, God willing, in the same matter that interprets Seeing the dead person sitting. . A bed or a crown on his head or decorated with jewels. If he sees that he is talking to the dead, he will live a long time, and this vision indicates that its owner reconciles with people after a quarrel. But if the dead person comes in a dream with his voice only and you cannot see him in the dream, then he begins to contact the dreamer or Talking to him and the dreamer answered his words, or the dead person asked him to go out with him and he went out and did not avoid him, then these cases make it clear that the dreamer’s end will be similar to the end of that dead person, whether in illness, or in coincidence, or in drowning, or in demolition. For him, or in anything else. When you see the deceased in a dream, whether you know him as a relative of his, or you know him without a relative, or you simply know that he has died, he comes to tell the fortuneteller that he will die at such and such a time, and this, and God knows best, is closer. To the truth when the dreamer’s life is coming to an end. Interpretation of a conversation with the dead in a dream: Seeing a dead person alive and talking to him in a dream, and knowing him well, is evidence that the dreamer’s great status is. Seeing a dead person telling the dreamer that he is alive and not dead is evidence that he has a great status. Great. To see the dead person telling the dreamer that he will meet him on a certain date is evidence of the dreamer’s death at the same time, and God knows best. The dead person spoke to the dreamer while he was alive in this world, indicating that he will enjoy happiness in the afterlife. Hearing the voice of the dead person in a dream without seeing him is evidence On the death of the dreamer. Hearing the voice of the dead and not doing what he told you in the dream also shows that you will be exposed to many problems, but you will survive them. Talking to the dead while he offers you food in a dream and you eat it, is evidence that you will get a lot of money. Talking to the dead and taking food from them is evidence of the abundant goodness that the dreamer will acquire in the near future. Seeing the dead person alive and crying loudly in a dream is evidence that the dead person is suffering severe torment in the afterlife and asking for charity and prayers for him. In the event that the dead person is seen coming back to life in In a dream, this is evidence that he will enjoy a great state of happiness in the afterlife. Seeing the dead person coming and speaking to you in the dream is an accusation

title: Interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream or abnormality by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Sodomy is taboo in Islam. Rather, it is an abomination. Sodomy is defined as sexual intercourse between two men. Sodomy leads to a lot of social and health damage because it contributes to the transmission of many sexually transmitted diseases such as AIDS and other diseases. The interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream or homosexuality today and until today is different. We will talk about the interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream or homosexuality. What is the interpretation of this vision by the scholar Ibn Sirin? Follow us. What is the interpretation? Seeing sodomy in a dream or abnormality? If someone dreams that he is committing indecency as the people of Lot did in a dream, then this has different interpretations, such as a mental disorder or illness, and it can also indicate that the dreamer is committing sins and acts of disobedience while he is far away. From God Almighty. Among the interpretations of a dream about sodomy also is that the dreamer feels broken because of his failure in his life in terms of work or study. Interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream or homosexuality with a friend Among the interpretations of a dream about sodomy also: - If someone dreams that he is committing an inappropriate act of Sodomy with a friend has many interpretations. It may indicate that this person is indulged in worldly pleasures and is trying to achieve his desires by any means. It can be interpreted as partners in an act or matter in reality, and God knows best. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about someone I know kissing me on the mouth. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the car from dust. Interpretation of a dream that someone is rude to me. If someone dreams that Someone commits an indecent act of sodomy to them and that person is known to them, then it is replaced by the fact that they are partners in real life in something. Also, this dream can be interpreted in terms of this person’s marriage to one of the dreamer’s relatives, that is, the occurrence of a mixed marriage between them, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream or a distortion by the scholar Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin did not interpret seeing sodomy in a dream as a bad or good vision, rather he interpreted it as As an indicator of the material issues and needs of a person in his life. It can also indicate that the dreamer will defeat his enemies. The scholar Ibn Sirin also interpreted the interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream or homosexuality as a sign that an evil friend whose morals are not good accompanies the dreamer. What is the dream interpretation of seeing two people practicing sodomy in a dream? If A person’s dream is to see in a dream two people practicing sodomy, and whether he knows these two people or not, this means that the dreamer is surrounded by bad people and friends with bad morals who encourage the dreamer to commit sins and disobedience. Everyone encourages him to do bad things. A person dreams of being sodomized by someone he does not know. Scientists have interpreted this vision contrary to what it seems. When we dream of this vision, we may expect its interpretation to be bad, but on the contrary, this vision shows that the one who had the vision will be victorious. On his enemies and perhaps also. To preach to him that God will open many doors of livelihood for him, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream or disobeying his boss at work. If someone dreams that he is dealing rudely with his boss

title: Interpretation of a dream that I memorized the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I memorized the Qur’an in a dream The vision of memorizing the Qur’an in a dream can have different interpretations, so we present in the following lines the interpretation of the dream that I memorized the Qur’an in a dream, all of this and much more.. Interpretation of a dream that I memorized the Qur’an in a dream Interpretation of a dream that I memorized the Qur’an in a dream, memorization The Qur’an can indicate knowledge, and God knows the unseen. Seeing memorizing the Qur’an may also indicate attaining a high status, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see an unmarried girl memorizing the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate the good deeds that she performs, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen memorizing the Qur’an. With justice, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about swearing by the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which he swore by the Qur’an in a dream could express the truth, and God knows the unseen, because seeing an oath in the Qur’an may indicate testimony about certain matters, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream that the two swearing oaths are in court, it may be This is evidence of the testimony of faith, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees an oath in the Qur’an in front of someone he knows, he may resort to searching for the truth, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams: I swear to God in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which I swear to God in a dream can indicate deception, and God knows the unseen, because seeing An oath in a dream can be a sign of deception on both sides, and God knows the unseen. When you see a vow in a dream, it can be a sign of humiliation, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees an oath and it is true in a dream, it can be a sign of kindness, victory, and speech. The truthful, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about driving a bus in a dream Interpretation of a dream about driving a bus in a dream could be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God knows best. When you see yourself driving a bus in a dream, this may indicate that you are trying to reach the right place, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of bribery in a dream: giving and receiving a bribe in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about paying a bribe or rejecting it in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman named Ibn Sirin who sees a bribe or gives money to the person of the bribing official. Interpretation of bribery in a dream Bribery in a dream symbolizes lying, and forbidding things and actions, and in the interpretation it is bad, with visions such as theft And usury.Interpretation of bribery in a dream: Dreaming about bribery in a dream generally indicates that the dreamer always commits offensive and immoral acts in secret, which makes him feel panicked, anxious, and afraid of exposure, and it may indicate moral collapse, problems, and problems that he will face. He is exposed to his life in general. Leading dream interpreters said that whoever dreams of taking a bribe in a dream, this indicates that he is easily influenced and performs immoral actions that he does not want, and the viewer must defend himself and refuse to carry out these actions, and whoever dreams of this. Is bribing someone, this indicates distress, troubles, and exposure to troubles in life. Interpretation of bribery in a dream Giving a bribe in a dream indicates that you will fall into great corruption and forbidden money, and the upcoming problems, difficulties, and problems that the dreamer will face with illegal or immoral actions. Interpretation of bribery in a dream: If A person dreams that he takes a bribe from a known or unknown person, then this indicates moral or religious corruption, and indicates that he takes the money of orphans and illicit money, and commits grave sins, sins and prohibitions. Interpretation of refusing a bribe in a dream When a person dreams of rejecting a bribe, this means that he is a person characterized by chivalry and pride. He has dignity, has good morals, and refuses to engage in immoral or illegal acts such as usury or eating orphans’ money and protects against them. Danger and desires. And whoever sees that he has turned away from the briber or the bribe-taker, this indicates the straight path and the correct approach that he takes in his life, and his staying away from forbidden things and falsehood. Interpretation of bribery in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees rejecting a bribe in a dream, this means that she will protect herself from Disturbances, deception, conspiracies, and evil deeds. Interpretation of bribery in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman sees in her dream that she refuses a bribe, this indicates that she is protecting herself from shameful acts, temptations, and taboos. Interpretation of bribery in a dream or a dream: Taking or accepting a bribe in a dream from an unknown or well-known person It indicates the existence of a harmless interest between the dreamer and this person, and the dream expresses corruption in religion, education, or morals. Without knowledge or awareness, such as lying, gossiping, or perjury, and taking a bribe in exchange for a service without right, indicates corruption in consciousness and spirit, and taking bribes from elderly women or children is prohibited from money, so there is no good or blessing for it. A gift or a bribe. This large amount expresses the aggravation of sins, mistakes, and bribery. It also symbolizes the consumption of an orphan’s money, and any forbidden money in waking life is depicted by the subconscious as a gift or a bribe, and this interpretation applies to the public employee, the judge, the policeman, and the bank employee if one of them sees this.

title: Feed the dog in a dream

preview.html: He is trying to develop it at this time, and raise it to a high position in his life, and the dream indicates desires, their pursuit, and the temptation of life for the dreamer in his affairs. Interpretation of seeing a dog being fed in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is feeding a dog in a dream and raising it in a dream. Here is an indication of She is seeking fame in her life, and is trying to reach the top, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that she is feeding the dog, and it disgusts him in the dream. This indicates that she is following her desires in life and seeking false temptations. And seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that she was... She places food in front of the dog in a dream. The meaning indicates that it will end the major crises that he was going through and is experiencing. An unmarried girl in a dream indicates what she sees as feeding the dog, which she did not raise in the dream. The meaning indicates that she will respond to something bad in her life until she ends it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a white dog. Interpretation of watching a dog being fed in a dream for a married woman. If the married woman sees in a dream that the dog wants food, then she feeds it in the dream. It shows that she will achieve some crises in her life and get rid of them soon. The married woman saw that the growing dog wanted food and fed it. Here The meaning indicates that he will reach something that he has been searching for for a long time. A married woman who sees that she is looking at a dog while eating his food in a dream declares that she will have a lot of goodness and abundance in her life, God willing. The married woman takes care of hungry dogs and brings them food. She declared That she will get something that she has wanted for a long time in her life. Interpretation of seeing a dog being fed in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that a dog wants food in a dream and feeds it. It announces that she will get rid of something bad that is spending a long time in her life. And seeing a divorced woman in a dream means that a dog wanted to He eats in a dream and is hungry. This is an indication that this divorced woman will go after something she wants. The divorced dreamer who sees that her ex-husband puts food for the dog in a dream. This indicates that her husband is always looking for her and trying to regain her admiration and admiration. If a divorced woman sees a dog in a dream and feeds it In the dream, she is happy. The meaning is interpreted that she will get rid of some of the crises that she is going through in her life. The interpretation of seeing a dog feeding a dog in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is looking at a hungry dog, and in the dream he feeds it happily. This means that he longs for something that he wants to happen. It is very difficult for him, God willing. If the dreamer looks at a hungry dog ​​in a dream and feeds it with his hands in the dream. This is an indication that he wants to reach the pinnacle in his life, and to reach many goals. And the dreamer who sees that the dog in the dream is very hungry and wants Food. This indicates that this dreamer will put an end to a major crisis that was ongoing in his life. And if the dreamer sees hungry dogs in a dream, and wants to feed them in the dream. The meaning indicates the good and righteous that this dreamer is thinking about in his life. You may also be interested in: Dogs Barking in a dream, meaning of seeing a dog

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother while he is alive

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother: Search for the meaning of the dream for good and evil. The brother is the link and backbone in life after the father, so his departure from this world causes pain and sadness for the dreamer. On our website today, we are pleased to discuss the different interpretations of the death of a brother in a dream by Ibn Sirin and a number of other dream interpreters. Interpretation of a dream of a brother’s death by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream of a brother’s death? The vision indicates protection from the deception of enemies and victory over them, and if the brother is already suffering from an illness, then Seeing his death in a dream is a sign of healing and complete recovery. If the fortuneteller is not married, it indicates his marriage, and if he attends his burial ceremony, it indicates the extent of his religiosity. If someone is sick and sees in a dream that his brother is dying in front of him, then the dream indicates getting rid of the disease, and the death of the older brother is a sign On serious harm to the dreamer, it must be so. Beware. Screaming and crying over the death of a brother in a dream is a sign of opening the doors of livelihood and kindness. What is the interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother according to Ibn Sirin? The death of a brother in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s journey, whether to work or study, and whoever dreams that he kisses his brother in a dream while he is in reality sick, then the dream It indicates recovery from illness. Whoever sees in a dream that his brother was killed and did not die, then the vision is good news of death for the sake of God. The death of the older brother in a dream indicates that he is in the father’s place, because it symbolizes salvation from evil, and this vision indicates that the people closest to him will move away. About the dreamer in his time of distress. The death of a brother without crying over him is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money from unknown sources. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother for a single woman: The death of a brother in one dream with crying and screaming is not a good vision, as it is evidence of hearing unpleasant news. Condolences for the brother In sleep, it is a praiseworthy vision, because it indicates that she is a religious girl. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a younger brother for a single woman: If she is sick, the vision indicates her recovery, and the death of the younger brother in one dream is a sign that he will advance in his work and reach the highest positions. Anyone who has suffered from stress And anxiety and saw the death of a brother, the dream heralds the end of this period and he will hear good news in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother for a married woman: The dream indicates that she will soon hear happy news, and if she suffers from a delay in childbearing and sees in her dream the death of her brother, this symbolizes the approaching pregnancy. This dream indicates salvation from the evil that befalls the dreamer and her husband. And that they will get rid of enemies, and the vision also expresses the arrival of food and goodness to the dreamer. Whoever sees in a dream the death of her brother and feels remorse for that is the cause of his death, the dream interprets that she has committed a sin and she must approach God to forgive her. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about the death A brother for a pregnant woman is one of the dreams that bodes well for her. Whoever sees that her brother died while she was pregnant, the dream indicates that she will give birth in health and safety, and the dream symbolizes that the child will be healthy. Whoever sees the death of her brother in a dream and screams and screams, this vision indicates that That the dreamer will have difficulty giving birth. Still do not find an interpretation of your dream? So

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white dog

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a white dog is one of the visions that everyone wonders about, because it indicates different interpretations and connotations, and in this dream there may be a message or notification to the dreamer, but the interpretation depends on the type and connotations. The color of the dog, and seeing a white dog in a dream can indicate a loyal, jealous, or malicious friend, and moreover it indicates injustice and victory, moreover it can indicate injustice and victory, so today we will give you the interpretation of a dream about a white dog in this article in The encyclopedia through the following lines.Interpretation of a dream about a white dogInterpretation of a dream about a white dog by Ibn ShaheenImam Ibn Shaheen believes that whoever sees a white dog chasing him in a dream indicates that there is a lot of goodness for the dreamer, if the dog does not cause any harm to the viewer, but if the dog is wild, The reason is any harm to the dreamer, as this indicates that there are dishonest people who will enter his life. And if the dreamer sees in his dream that there is a group of dogs that attacked him, but he killed them, then this indicates that he will get rid of his enemies, and this vision also shows that the dreamer will be able to achieve what he wants. on him. He wants, but he will be exposed to many obstacles. Interpretation of a dream about a white dog for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees a white dog in her dream, this may mean that she is raising a white dog, and it eats in her house and sits with her, and it may also indicate that this unmarried girl will deceive one of her when she With that. He enters her house and eats from it, but God Almighty saves her from the evil of that person. But if a girl dreams that she sees a very white dog from afar and is afraid of it, this indicates that there is a bad person who wants to get close to her, but she will soon get rid of him. Interpretation of a dream about a white dog for a married woman: A married woman saw in her dream that her husband brought her a white dog and gave it to her as a gift, so she accepted it. This indicates that that married woman will bring her someone to sit with and sit with, and she will be like that. Very malicious and cunning, but God Almighty protects her from it. Interpretation of a dream about a white dog in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in her dream that her husband gave her a white dog, this indicates that there are many problems between them, but they will be resolved soon. As for a divorced woman, if she sees in a dream that she wants to buy A small white dog, but she did not succeed in getting it, this indicates that she will face some problems with her ex-husband’s family, but God Almighty preserved her. Interpretation of a dream about a white dog for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in a dream that her unborn child is playing with a white dog If If someone dreams in his dream that he sees a small white dog and plays with it, this means that he will face some problems, but God Almighty will save him from them. But if a man sees in a dream that a woman is giving him

title: What is the interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Crying in a dream is one of the recurring dreams of some people. It is known that crying is the primary means of expressing distress, sadness, and emotions in general. Psychological studies have confirmed that crying is one of the best ways to help reduce the impact of stress and anxiety. Emotions. Stress, so today we will point out through us the most important interpretations of crying in a dream indicated by the great dream interpreters. Crying in a dreamCrying loudly in a dream means that the dreamer is currently going through a state of sadness and anguish and cannot express his feelings to anyone. Crying loudly and crying indicates In a dream, it indicates the possibility that the dreamer will face a big problem. Seeing crying in a dream without crying is also mentioned as a sign of great relief that will happen in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. Seeing tears flowing in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is about to have something embarrassing and will be exposed to problems that will have consequences. Disaster will continue with the dreamer for a period of time. The prominent scholar Ibn Shaheen indicated that seeing blood crying instead of normal crying is evidence that the dreamer feels extreme remorse for what he did in the past. Crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that crying in a dream is one of the dreams that carries A set of good meanings, contrary to what some people think. The following are the most prominent interpretations mentioned about this vision: The dreamer’s crying is evidence of the blessing that will come in his life, with the possibility of greatly increasing his livelihood, and God knows best. Crying in the dream of a newly married man is good news that God Almighty will bless him with good offspring and will be good for him. In the future. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is crying intensely, this is evidence that he has been exposed to great injustice in his life, knowing that the dream carries a reassuring message from God Almighty that the coming days will be much better and helpful. For him over enemies. As for someone who dreams that he is crying without screaming or crying while he is currently going through a major crisis and psychological problem, this is evidence that he will be able to overcome everything he is going through and the future will be better, God willing. Crying in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is unable to make the appropriate decision regarding the problems he is facing in the past period. Ibn Sirin says that crying in a dream is good news for someone who suffers from a lack of livelihood, as the vision leads to an abundance of money and livelihood, as he will soon enjoy With many good deeds until his heart breaks with joy. But if he sees loud cries accompanied by intense lamentations, this is evidence that the dreamer must repent for the sins he has committed recently, knowing that he has wronged many people in his path and he must seek forgiveness from them. Crying in a dream for single peopleCrying in a dream For an unmarried woman, there is good news. In the coming period, she will witness great happiness and find true love and the right man with the characteristics that she has always dreamed of. She cries intensely in the dream, but without a sound. A benign vision, as it indicates that the dreamer will achieve great success in her life and will be able to Overcoming everyone who advised her and wished her. Shame. If she sees something

As for whoever sees in his dream that he is crying intensely, this is evidence that he has been exposed to great injustice in his life, knowing that the dream carries a reassuring message from God Almighty that the coming days will be much better and helpful. For him over enemies. As for someone who dreams that he is crying without screaming or crying while he is currently going through a major crisis and psychological problem, this is evidence that he will be able to overcome everything he is going through and the future will be better, God willing. Crying in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is unable to make the appropriate decision regarding the problems he is facing in the past period. Ibn Sirin says that crying in a dream is good news for someone who suffers from a lack of livelihood, as the vision leads to an abundance of money and livelihood, as he will soon enjoy With many good deeds until his heart breaks with joy. But if he sees loud cries accompanied by intense lamentations, this is evidence that the dreamer must repent for the sins he has committed recently, knowing that he has wronged many people in his path and he must seek forgiveness from them. Crying in a dream for single peopleCrying in a dream For an unmarried woman, there is good news. In the coming period, she will witness great happiness and find true love and the right man with the characteristics that she has always dreamed of. She cries intensely in the dream, but without a sound. A benign vision, as it indicates that the dreamer will achieve great success in her life and will be able to Overcoming everyone who advised her and wished her. Shame. If she sees something
